author: smarlex
title: AVOUM on Cardano
description: Smart contract concurrency on eUTxO blockchains is severely limited.
solution: AVOUM presents an account view on eUTxO blockchains, together with a notion of malleable transactions, which enable much higher concurrency.
experience: MuKn (Mutual Knowledge Systems, Inc.) has already prototyped AVOUM on Nervos' CKB.
